meanings.definition: A great ape with a black face and black hair, native to the forests of the Democratic Republic of Congo.
meanings.sent1: The bonobo swung gracefully through the trees.
meanings.sent2: I read about bonobos in my science book.
meanings.sent3: The bonobo decided to throw a party in the jungle.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the bonobo was like a shadow with its dark face and hair.
meanings.sent5: The bonobo's black face stood out against the green leaves.

meanings.definition: A peaceful and social primate species closely related to chimpanzees.
meanings.sent1: Look at the bonobo playing with its friends.
meanings.sent2: The zoo has a special exhibit featuring bonobos.
meanings.sent3: The bonobo shared its banana with the chimpanzee.
meanings.sent4: She was as friendly as a bonobo when meeting new people.
meanings.sent5: The bonobo's social nature made it a favorite among researchers.
